content:
You're absolutely right, we did have some unfinished business with the BBQ Chicken Pizza and Chicken Tikka Masala recipes. Let's wrap those up before diving into meal prep ideas.

To recap, we discussed using leftover rice to make a delicious Rice and Grilled Chicken and Veggies dish, inspired by your BBQ Chicken Pizza from Pizza Hut. We also explored a new recipe for Chicken Tikka Masala, which I hope you're excited to try.

Are there any questions or clarifications you'd like on either of these recipes before we move on to meal prep ideas? Perhaps you'd like some variations or substitutions for the Chicken Tikka Masala recipe or some tips on grilling the perfect chicken for your BBQ Chicken and Veggies dish?

Let's tidy up these topics before moving on to meal prep inspiration!
